module.title: Resource: FileBucket
module.description:
Local storage of hashed files.
Indices add files in database and stores file by hash names. Files can be assigned to modules and virtual paths.
module.author: Christian Würker

config.name: path
config.title: path to hashed files within contents folder

module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>files`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>files` ( `fileId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creatorId` int(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `moduleId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `hash` varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `mimeType` varchar(60) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `fileSize` decimal(20,0) NOT NULL, `filePath` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `fileName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `viewedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `viewCount` int(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`fileId`), KEY `creatorId` (`creatorId`), KEY `hash` (`hash`), KEY `mimeType` (`mimeType`), KEY `fileSize` (`fileSize`), KEY `filePath` (`filePath`), KEY `fileName` (`fileName`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
